title: Floating free. The Magic rolling board. Log driver's waltz
brief_description: Floating free (prod., dir. Jerry Butts): Depicts the skill and virtuosity involved in the 1977 World Frisbee Championships. “The Magic rolling board” (prod., dirs. Jim Freeman, Greg McGillvray): A skateboarding extravaganza which captures every expression of the sport. “Log driver’s waltz”: A short cartoon dedicated to the graceful Canadian log driver.
